body.name: NETGEAR Nighthawk 12-Stream WiFi 6E Router (RAXE500) | AXE11000 Tri-Band Wireless Speed (Up to 10.8Gbps) |New 6GHz Band | Coverage up to 3,500 sq. ft., 60 Devices
body.merchantInfo: Ships from and sold by A&J Variety Inc.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 8 mins
features: 6GHz WiFi band dedicated to WiFi 6E devices including Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra 5G. Enjoy 4K/8K video streaming, AR/VR gaming and HD videoconferencing.Beamforming : Improve range and performance for 2.4GHz, 5GHz & 6GHz devices. Automatic firmware update delivers latest security patches to the router.
Powerful 1.8GHz quad-core processor gives you exceptional 10.8Gbps WiFi speed, 9x faster than WiFi 5. Backward compatible for all WiFi devices on 2.4GHz and 5GHz bands
Coverage up to 3,500 sq. ft. and 60 devices
Replace your existing WiFi Router (separate modem or modem router required). Compatible with any Internet Service Provider up to 2Gbps including cable, satellite, fiber, DSL and more
Sets up in minutes with the Nighthawk app – easily manage WiFi settings at the device and network level, test internet speed and monitor data usage
4 x 1G and 1 x 2.5G Ethernet ports for computers, game consoles, streaming players and other wired devices
NETGEAR Armor protects your family's WiFi with an automatic shield of security across all your connected devices with a 30-day free trial
NETGEAR Smart Parental Controls promotes healthy Internet habits, fosters responsibility and builds trust with your kids (30-day free trial included)

OFDMA, MU-MIMO, Dynamic QoS, 1024-QAM, Smart Connect for one WiFi name, Beamforming technologies and Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant Voice Control. Supports WPA2/WPA3 wireless security protocols. Includes Guest WiFi access, DoS, Firewall, VPN and more
body.description: NETGEAR Nighthawk Tri-band RAXE500 WiFi Router uses the latest WiFi 6E technology to provide faster speeds and less congestion with 200% more spectrum than dual-band. This router is built to keep up with hyper-connected homes processing high levels of data simultaneously. Now you can enjoy faster speeds and smoother streaming when using high-bandwidth applications like 4K/8K video streaming and AR/VR gaming. A powerful 64-bit 1.8GHz quad-core processor delivers fast and reliable connections to all devices and applications. Twelve WiFi streams mean more available bandwidth and less congestion for all devices on WiFi.Maximize your Internet speeds of up to 2.5Gbps with new versatile Ethernet wired connections. Plus, eight high-performance antennas on the router amplify WiFi signals for maximized range and reliable coverage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The NETGEAR Nighthawk Tri-Band WiFi 6E Router AXE11000 has far exceeded my expectations, from when I opened it to setting it up. Not only does its sleek design add a touch of elegance to my workspace, but it also hints at the impressive performance that lies within.Setting up this router was incredibly easy, thanks to the user-friendly Nighthawk app. It guided me through a seamless process that had my network operational in just minutes. As someone who has struggled with complex router configurations in the past, I greatly appreciate NETGEAR's approach to making things simple and intuitive.In terms of performance, the AXE11000 is truly remarkable. With its WiFi 6E capability, all my devices now experience lightning-fast speeds and minimal interference or congestion due to its tri-band setup—even with multiple tech-savvy teenagers constantly using bandwidth-intensive activities like online gaming and streaming high-resolution videos in 4K. Thanks to this exceptional router, these activities now run smoothly without any interruptions or disruptions.The level of coverage is truly impressive. I've noticed a significant reduction in areas with weak signals, and even when I'm at the furthest distance from the router, the signal strength remains consistently strong. It's evident that NETGEAR has made substantial investments in advanced antennas and powerful amplifiers to ensure maximum reach and performance.When it comes to security, the RAXE500 excels as well. With its integration of NETGEAR Armor powered by Bitdefender, I feel confident knowing that all my devices are fully protected against various cyber threats lurking in today's digital world.If there is any downside worth mentioning, it would be its slightly higher price point. However, given the remarkable features and stability it offers, especially for homes requiring high connectivity demands, I believe it proves itself a worthwhile investment.In summary, the NETGEAR Nighthawk Tri-Band WiFi 6E Router AXE11000 is an impressive addition to any household network. It offers high-speed connectivity, extensive coverage, and robust security features—all without sacrificing performance. I highly recommend this product for anyone seeking to enhance their home internet experience and unlock its full potential.Rating: 5 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game-Changing Experience with NETGEAR Nighthawk RAXE500
reviews.reviewText: From the moment I unboxed the NETGEAR Nighthawk Tri-Band WiFi 6E Router AXE11000 (RAXE500), I knew I was in for a treat. This router has completely transformed my home's internet experience.Firstly, the setup was a breeze. The instructions were clear, and I had the router up and running in no time. The sleek design is not only aesthetically pleasing but also fits perfectly in my living space without being intrusive.Performance-wise, the RAXE500 is nothing short of remarkable. The tri-band feature ensures that all my devices get the bandwidth they need without any lag or buffering. Streaming 4K videos and online gaming have never been smoother. The WiFi 6E technology really makes a noticeable difference in both range and speed, providing consistent and reliable connections throughout my house.Security is a top priority for me, and the RAXE500 delivers on that front as well. The NETGEAR Armor powered by BitDefender offers an added layer of protection that gives me peace of mind, knowing that my network and connected devices are safe from cyber threats.Lastly, I must commend the NETGEAR team for their excellent customer support. Any queries I had were promptly and professionally addressed, which only added to the overall positive experience.In conclusion, the NETGEAR Nighthawk RAXE500 is a top-tier router that offers unparalleled performance, range, and security. It's a significant upgrade from my previous router and well worth the investment. I highly recommend it to anyone looking to enhance their home internet experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A month review
reviews.reviewText: I upgraded to 1 Gig service and my previous router wasn't cutting it. I read some reviews and decided on this gem. It was a super easy install, downloaded the app and setup was fast. The software that you can purchase isn't needed to function. I declined the expensive service. So I have a 2300 sqft home 4 tvs with 4 firesticks plus computers so I needed a workhorse. This router has been running flawlessly and haven't had one issue of any kind. I'm very pleased with my purchase. Fast, easy to use app, and reliable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Where speed meets style.
reviews.reviewText: The NightHawk RAXE300 is a powerhouse of a router that delivers exceptional performance and reliability. With its cutting-edge technology, this router provides blazing-fast Wi-Fi speeds, making it ideal for bandwidth-intensive tasks like online gaming and 4K streaming. The sleek design adds a touch of sophistication to any setup, while the user-friendly interface ensures a seamless and hassle-free experience during setup and usage. With robust security features and advanced parental controls, the NightHawk RAXE300 prioritizes both speed and safety, making it a top choice for tech enthusiasts and families alike. Invest in the future of connectivity with the NightHawk RAXE300 – where speed meets style.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen router pero esperaba un poco más
reviews.reviewText: Compré este Router para reemplazar mi Asus RT-AC68U que he tenido por 9 años. Creí que tendría un alcance mayor pero solo mejoró ligeramente con respecto al router anterior. La banda de 6Ghz no se ve en México. Es muy fácil de configurar utilizando la app. Las velocidades de transferencia son buenísimas. El router luce fenomenal. 1 punto negativo sería los servicios de suscripción que deberían venir incluidos ya que no es un router precisamente barato.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente router pero la banda de 6ghz no se ven en México.
reviews.reviewText: Este router lo compré para reemplazar el R7800 y estoy muy satisfecho por el cambio, tengo el doble de velocidad de transferencia comparado con el 7800, es súper estable, no lo reinicié desde que lo compré a la fecha que estoy escribiendo este comentario.Tiene muy buen alcance en un radio de 100m2.El único detalle que tiene es que en México no se la banda de 6GHZ, por ende si lo compras pensando usar esa banda, con este router no va, por eso le saco una estrella.Lo recomiendo ampliamente.
